name: Close call (Bernique)
description:
Jump as long as you can to beat the clock at its own game ! Move quickly around with three extra jumps which reload every time you're on a platform !

Controls

A-D: Move
Space: Jump

Credits

Player controller: Tarodev Controller
https://youtu.be/3sWTzMsmdx8

Music: Digital Dilemma - VOiD1 Gaming (from Free Action Music Pack)
https://void1gaming.itch.io/free-action-music-pack
